title: Lou Rawls
summary: Louis Allen Rawls (December 1, 1933 â€“ January 6, 2006) was an American record producer, singer, composer and actor.[1] Rawls released more than 60 albums, sold more than 40 million records,[2] and had numerous charting singles, most notably his song "You'll Never Find Another Love like Mine". He worked as a film, television, and voice actor. He was also a three-time Grammy-winner, all for Best Male R&B Vocal Performance.
